alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mackinac; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 3:42PM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mackinac; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
